Articles.Content: Is there any way to post screenshots that you dont need a link to see, and not make an account on a photo shring website. if not, how do you make thos igmur albums with the pictures at the bottom that you can scroll through, i want to share my eve lander.
Upload image to a site like imageshack.com, flickr.com, or imgur.com. Then get the direct link. YOu will know because it will end in a .png or .jpg fille extension. Post that inside .
so theres no way to post pictures without making an account on a photo sharing website?
I would recommend postimage.org - no signin necessary. The only downside is, no animated GIFs.
i dont really need gifs, so thanks

Check the Forum FAQ all the answers to the questions you asked can be found there

Also, you don't need to create an account to upload images to imgur, just go there, upload them and link them You can even make albums without signing in.
Tinypic.com is good to, no sign in
Yeah, but it has a captcha thing.
